data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ward, Philip S., Blaimer, Bonnie B., Fisher, Brian L. (2016): A revised phylogenetic classification of the ant subfamily Formicinae (Hymenoptera: Formicidae), with resurrection of the genera Colobopsis and Dinomyrmex. Zootaxa 4072 (3): 343-357, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4072.3.4
